artist: Engraver: Richard Earlom; Draftsman: after Claude de Lorraine; Publisher: Hurst, Robinson & Co.
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription: BC, on image, lettered: libro settimo di Virgile Sepra Coma Accado [?] Eano il Cer [?] di Sigliada [?] di Tirio [?] Claudio fe Roma 1678 | LL, in margin below image, lettered: Claude Lorraine delt. / No. 93. | BC, in margin below image, lettered: London. Pub. May 2, 1817. by Boydell & Co. 90 Cheapside. / From the Original Drawing in the Collection of the Duke of Devonshire. | LR, in margin below image, lettered: R. Earlom sculpt.
portfolio: From Plate 93 from Liber Veritatis, vol. 3 (London, 1819)
title: Landscape with Aeneas Hunting
